title: Mumbai BMC elections 2026: Full schedule, voting time and result date
description: As Maharashtra preps for essential municipal elections involving 29 corporations, the spotlight is on Mumbai where the BMC showdown between the BJP-backed Mahayuti and the united Thackeray coalition is making waves. On January 15, over 3.48 crore voters will cast their votes, choosing from 15,931 hopefuls. This pivotal election is underscored by strategic alliances and enticing offers targeting women voters.

From Chabahar to Kashmir: Why chaos in Iran hurts India, benefits China & Pakistan
description: India watches Iran's protests with unease, fearing a weakened state would disrupt its strategic environment. Iran serves as India's vital western corridor to Central Asia via Chabahar Port and a crucial counterweight to Pakistan's regional influence. A collapse risks jeopardizing connectivity projects and India's multi-alignment policy.

description: The Supreme Court denied bail to student activists Umar Khalid and Sharjeel Imam in the 2020 Delhi riots case, citing a "hierarchy of culpability." While five co-accused were granted bail, the court found Khalid and Imam to be "ideological drivers" central to the alleged conspiracy's planning and preparation, distinguishing their roles from mere facilitators.

Silicon Wars: Nvidia GPUs vs Google TPUs
description: The AI hardware market is undergoing a major transformation. Nvidia's dominance with GPUs is being challenged by specialized chips like Google's TPUs and Groq's LPUs. Companies are now opting for a mix of hardware for training and inference. This shift prioritizes efficiency and speed, moving beyond raw power. The demand for specialized processors is rising as AI services expand.

description: US-bound shipments did fall sharply after Donald Trump raised duties in 2025. But under Xi Jinping's guidance, Chinese exporters responded with speed and ingenuity. Sales surged instead to Southeast Asia, Africa, Latin America and Europe. In many cases, goods were routed through third countries, blunting the effect of US tariffs altogether.

IShowSpeed net worth timeline: How Darren Watkins Jr built his fortune
description: Darren Watkins Jr, known as IShowSpeed, transformed from a young gamer into a global streaming sensation. His earnings grew steadily from YouTube ads to music, tours, and brand deals.  Starting with minimal income, his net worth surged significantly between 2020 and 2026, reaching an estimated $35-40 million.  He maintains a private personal life.

title: Phil Taylor’s net worth timeline: Darts legend’s earnings and life journey
description: Phil Taylor is an English former professional darts player who has a net worth of $7 million, according to the celebrity net worth. The 63-year-old bowed out from the PDC after being defeated by Rob Cross in the 2018 World Championship final, but is still competing in the senior competitions. He was ranked in the second position according to Givemesport. His £8.5 million in profits.

title: Amazon's RTO gets stricter: Managers tracking hours; three types of employees under scanner
description: Amazon is now closely monitoring office attendance, tracking not just presence but also exact hours spent by corporate employees. This escalation in surveillance, revealed by an internal document, flags 'Low-Time Badgers' and 'Zero Badgers' who don't meet in-office expectations. The move follows a strict five-day return-to-office mandate, with similar tracking systems emerging at tech rivals like Samsung and Dell.

title: Erika Kirk faces backlash for attending Peach Bowl alone amid parenting debate
description: Erika Kirk faced online criticism after attending the Peach Bowl in Atlanta without her children on January 10, 2025. Social media users questioned her choices following the death of her husband, Charlie Kirk. While many criticized her parenting, others defended her, saying grief is personal. Erika has not responded to the backlash.

title: MrBeast net worth timeline: From zero to billions in a decade
description: Jimmy Donaldson, known as MrBeast, transformed from a modest YouTuber in 2016 to a billionaire by 2024. His strategy of reinvesting nearly all earnings into extreme content and launching successful ventures like Feastables and MrBeast Burger fueled this meteoric rise. By 2026, his estimated net worth is projected to reach $2.

title: Vanessa Bryant revisits Kobe’s iconic footwork vs Hornets
description: Vanessa Bryant continues to honor her late husband, Kobe Bryant, by sharing cherished memories. Recently, she posted a throwback clip of Kobe's incredible 2008 dunk against the Charlotte Hornets, highlighting his 'Mamba Mentality.'  She also expressed gratitude on behalf of the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation for the support enabling opportunities for young athletes.
